mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SELLSKU, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, SHOPUSERID, NUMFORUS, NUMFORAU, NUMFORUK, NUMFORCA, NUMFORDE, TEMPORARY, TOTAL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CORPID, OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERIME, CREATETIME, FLAGUS, FLAGAU, FLAGUK, FLAGCA, FLAGDE from DB_SELLSKUFORSHOP where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
